ComicInfo.Summary:
In a time of ancient gods, warlords and kings…a land in turmoil called out for a hero! She was XENA, a mighty princess forged in the heat of battle! In this all-new series, writer VITA AYALA (Black Panther, Shuri, Wonder Woman, The Wilds) and OLYMPIA SWEETMAN throw Xena and her companion Gabrielle headfirst into a mysterious adventure. Can Xena discover the secrets of a village full of super-strong children, before jealous and petty GODS get involved?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | David Mack | 1 | B | Cover B | Emanuela Lupacchino | 2 | C | Cover C | Erica Henderson | 3 | D | Cover D | Paulina Ganucheau | 4 | E | Cover E | Raul Allen & Patricia Martin | 5 | F/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | David Mack | 6 | G/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Emanuela Lupacchino | 7 | H/RI | 1:30 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Erica Henderson | 8 | I/RI | 1:40 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Paulina Ganucheau | 9 | J/RI | 1:50 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Raul Allen & Patricia Martin | 10 | K/Var | "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Emanuela Lupacchino | 11 | L/RE | Atlas Edition Signed Variant Cover | David Mack | 12 | M/RE | Blank Authentix Variant Cover | None | 13 |
